mapper.select: select count(*) from inventory where quantity is not null and quantity != 0
select * from inventory inner join ingredient on inventory.ingredientid = ingredient.ingredientid and quantity is not null and quantity != 0 order by exp limit #{start}, #{count}
select * from ingredientorder inner join ingredient on ingredient.ingredientid = ingredientorder.ingredientid order by orderdate desc limit #{start}, #{count}
select * from (usedetail inner join inventory on inventory.inventoryid = usedetail.inventoryid) inner join ingredient on ingredient.ingredientid = inventory.ingredientid limit #{start}, #{count}
